content.detailedDescription: I went hiking in in southern california (claremont trails) on 01/22/18 at about 10:30am i was on the west side of the mountain/trails (facing los angeles) when i noticed a shiny object in the sky. the sun would reflect off it from time to time. at first i thought it could be a drone at a distance or a silver type of weather balloon but upon closer inspection i realized it was big and metallic. it was hoovering/floating around in the same area for a little while. initially, to ne eyes it looked like a cylinder or l shape wise. then i grabbed an older samsung camera which has 35 x optimization and snapped a few pictures. it was difficult at first because the object was bot standing still and i am new to using that camera. once i snapped a few good pics i realized the objext was shapped more like a triangle. as i zoomed in then i realized it was shaped exactly like the letter a. eventually, it started to move eastward in a floating somewhat erratic style. i eventually lost sight of it as it went over the mountains. there was a couple next to me also taking pictures on their cell phone. i didn't get to talk to him as the male was conducting a real estate deal on the phone in spanish as he was snapping pictures with what i presume to be his wifes phone. the object did seem high in the sky and became moreso as it traveled eastward. the objext definitely felt like it was out of this world type stuff. im more in awe with how it was moving/floating/turning etc. it was an amazing experience. i actually believe this object is what people have witnessed at night and call orange orbs.
content.summary: Metallic object shaped like the letter a. two big lights/thrusters/plasma lights on bottom. hoovering then floating away eastward

content.detailedDescription:
My fiance and i were sitting in our car port area while he was smoking a cigarette. i caught a glimpse of a super bright star like object. and then i noticed that this light was actually pulsating colors and looked to be glowing green. i thought oh it must be a airplane or helicopter. as i said this, a plane came across the sky and subsequently flew over my home. i noted the lights were not the same colors and it didn't take it long to cross the sky, while this object was pretty much stationary. i voiced my concern to my fiance. who also noted this.

as i stared at the object longer i realized it was pretty much in a stable area of the sky. the clouds were sporadic but i could see a green glowing aura type area around the central light that was flickering the yellow/orange/and extremely bright white color. the white reminded me of how light would reflect off of a mirror and was shockingly bright. the way the lights were flickering it made it look like it was actually trying to communicate. 

i then tried to think of what else it could possibly be. i brainstormed and thought perhaps it's a helicopter. we have those fly over on occasion. unfortunately that explanation falls short since i could not hear it and it barely moved in the time frame that i was outside (over 15 mins). i didn't want to make any snap conclusions. so i thought perhaps it may be the iss going across the sky. so basically i settled on that being the most logical explanation and went inside. later i looked online and realized the iss doesn't have any lights. now my heart dropped and i thought omg what did i actually see then!

i also looked up planets visible in my area and found that most were difficult to see that night. possibly due to the sporadic cloud cover. but that cloud cover is what made the glowing green aura so much more prevalent. the object did look like it was moving at times. only other thing i can logically think it might be is a satellite passing by but i'm still not satisfied as that being an answer to "what was this". 

several days prior to this space x launched and there were reports of a ufo spotted by the river that night as well. i didn't make the connection until i looked up any ufo sightings in my area. and saw one from the night of the launch with the same color scheme of lights that i saw. 

i also noted that night that there was an unusual amount of dogs barking in the area for no logical reason. and noticed my animals acting a bit off that night like they were cautiously curious but semi spooked.
content.summary: Green glowing light hovering over titusville by the river. several days after space x launch.

content.detailedDescription: Being a forest ranger, i was on stake out at night. it was so dark that i couldn't t see my partner 10 feet from me. suddenly it went from dark to bright progressively just like daytime. the bright light stayed at least 20 seconds and after that i don t really remember anything.
content.summary: Peace officer during stake out . bright light lasted 20 seconds then took off with no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I was working security at the neptune resort when it occurred...

at 4:03am to 04:11 i was witnessing an ufo event over the gulf of mexico. the two objects were about 3 miles in the air about 50 miles south of the loggerhead lighthouse. they were just like twinkling stars for a short period, i notices them because the only lights visible normally are the loggerhead lh and the airplane warning lights on one of the bp oil rigs. the southernmost object would glow brighter and brighter then flash an amber light cone at the other object. it did this a couple times. this light was going out in a cone shaped wave and bright across hundreds of miles of skyline. then it beamed the light in my general direction... illuminating the beach and building to the north of me in a bright amber-orange light. i started filming on my phone. the southmost object did this light "charge" a couple more times but didn't shoot the beams out that i could see. they then started flying opposite directions simultaneously. in about 10-15 seconds they covered about 25-30 miles distance each... that is roughly 2-2.5mps or 7200-9000mph! then they just vanished... like slowly faded out, dimmed their lights, or cloaked themselves. they must have been huge also... roughly 1000sqft or more each to be able to see them as clearly as i did. they had to have been 150 miles away from me since loggerhead is about 185 miles across the gulf. just wanted to report it and share my experience.
content.summary: Two pulsating/glowing orbs moved close to one another. one blinking the other emitting amber beams of light. then they separated quickly and vanished.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I went out to take a picture of the moon with my new camera (nikon coolpix b500) but there was no moon out, and then i saw a very dim white light just over the clouds, and then another one appeared next to it, so i started taking pictures, and the camera was on (moonlight setting) so it saw stuff that i couldn't see with the naked eye, such as another white light that completed a perfect triangle formation in the clouds, along with a transparent green/blue flying saucer with lights on the inside. then the green/blue craft flew up in the clouds, then emitted some sort of green aura. but what is insane is that about 5 hours later at my cousins house about 2-3 miles away from my house we all saw the giant lights in the clouds, so i took more pictures, and then it started to form the same triangle, next thing i know, it was right over me again.... yep, twice in one night, and i got the photos to prove it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 2 sightings in one night, giant lights in clouds with green/blue saucer

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to take a picture of the moon with my new camera (nikon coolpix b500) but there was no moon out, and then i saw a very dim white light just over the clouds, and then another one appeared next to it, so i started taking pictures, and the camera was on (moonlight setting) so it saw stuff that i couldn't see with the naked eye, such as another white light that completed a perfect triangle formation in the clouds, along with a transparent green/blue flying saucer with lights on the inside, flying under the clouds, just over my head. then the green/blue craft flew up in the clouds, then emitted some sort of green aura. but what is insane is that about 5 hours later at my cousins house about 2-3 miles away from my house, we all saw the giant lights in the clouds, again. so i took more pictures, and then it started to form the same triangle, next thing i know, it was right over me again.... yep, twice in one night, and i got the photos to prove it.



the first sighting happened for about 30 minutes. and the second sighting only happened for about 7 minutes.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw one, then 2 appear. then my camera picked up more, with a clear shot of the craft

content.detailedDescription:
i was traveling on hwy 4 east bound in the area of antioch,ca, contra costa county at about 9:10 pm returning home with my wife from a class when i saw two lights from what i thought was a large plane. i pointed it out to my wife and said that the plane was flying pretty low for such a big plane. i'm a retired fire captain from the san francisco bay area. it caught my attention because a commercial passenger plane would not be in this area so low unless it was in some kind of trouble. i saw two solid white lights and one white light blinking. my wife then looked over and said it's not a plane it's just hovering. as i looked back over i could now see the solid black triangle hovering about 2-300 ft to my left and about 300 ft in the air.The two solid lights were on the outside edges of the triangle with the leading light blinking. since i was driving my wife continued to watch it and said it had turned and was now above us. she had opened the moon roof and i could see it clearly. when i had first seen it , it was pointed to the west and now was pointed south/west. i pulled off the nearest off ramp and got back on the freeway heading west to continue watching. by the time i had got turned around it had disappeared in the steam cloud produced by the hydro electric company. we then pulled off the freeway again and positioned our self's below the steam cloud waiting for it to reappear. we waited several minuets and was unable to see it again. 
    when i first made it out to be a triangle i was slightly excited cause i've belonged to mufon in the past and was just looking ate some old mufon magazines last night. i said to my wife " it;s the triangle ufo i've shown you and talked about". the amazing part is that now we were both seeing it as clear as can be.
content.summary: traveling east bound hwy 4 about 21:10 and saw what i thought was a large plane and when pointed out to my wife she said it just hovering. i lookes back over head and saw a large black triangle with a white light at each point, leading light was flashi

content.detailedDescription: Was taking pictures of the sun because the shape looked different then usual and noticed this object in several of them, plus another shadow of what looks like the sun reflecting of clouds, obviously this ufo was moving as the appearance of the smaller outer balls on the larger ufo ball was changing. apparently this same object was seen back in 2014 in virginia and also somewhere else both day and night photos and videos which were uploaded to youtube, one on witness101 (mine), another on ufov2012 (something like that).
content.summary: Transparent round ball like object with little round balls on and around it, next to sun area.

content.detailedDescription: Help
content.summary: Was abducted in a dream and couldn't remember what was said to me and then the next day i was using siri to text someone and said talk. then my iphone responded with what i believe to be latin and and untranslated phrase.

content.detailedDescription:
1.My wife and i were driving from the poconos to cape cod on i84.
2. my wife woke me and said"what on earth is that?"
3. i said" it's..It's a ufo!...Unless i"m dreaming!"
4. it was a crescent of colored lights above the highway ahead. as we drove under it, it was a huge circle and appeared to be stationary. it was so big it filled my vision as i hung out of my window gazing up at it and seemed like a flying football stadium.
i was excited, my wife was scared, we were both very puzzled.
my wife would not stop the car and the last i saw of it was through the rear window as a distant elipse.
sorry this is old news...Our encounter was over 30 years ago!
ufo magazine in england had me write an article about our experience ten years later. i'll see if i can attach it.
content.summary: It looked exactly like that famous photo,taken a few nights prior by that policeman

content.detailedDescription: At about 2:30 am, a smoke alarm in our home went off.  we could not detect any smoke, nor could we shut off the alarm without taking out the batteries.  we decided we should  play it safe and try to take our children and leave the house for the night.  due to heavy snowfall, our car was parked at the bottom of a hill, approximately 1/4 mile away.  i walked down the hill to try to bring the car up to the house, and about half way down a small (size of basketball) globe flew swiftly up the hill toward me, flew almost directly over me and then continued northward up the hill.  flying from south to north, it maintained a consistent tree-top altitude as it flew up the hill.  the globe was a fiery red-orange color, and made no sound., i lost sight of it behind the trees as it continued up the mountainside.
content.summary: Small glowing object flew overhead at low elevation

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Was out walking dog when i noticed an orange glowing ball moving west (around seminole high school) from the east, much slower than helicopters or planes. i was told this was around same time as int'l space station was in observation, but that was traveling sw-ne, and this was moving in opposite direction.

at first i though it may be a helicopter or possible smaller plane as we have sanford international airport within a few miles, but this was a bright orange light that didn't blink or change color, and that flickered brighter and dimmed multiple times, which was what caught my eye. and it seemed lower than most planes fly in on approach (from west to east). smoothly glided into a cloud and i lost sight. bummed i didn't have my phone for a video :(
content.summary: Orange glowing ball moving through clouds.

content.detailedDescription: at the time of the sighting, was working at my job location site of a sand/gravel production pit that was located approx. 1/4 mile to the west of the intersection area of i-25 and co st. hwy. 119, just to the north of hwy. 119, near the little community of del camino, co.  was in the site's large-material "crusher" area, with the area shut down to begin lunch break, which was generally eaten while sitting around in our parked, personal vehicles.  after having started the lunch break, i took the opportunity to casually glance around and observe my surroundings, including the sky.  the day had quite hot temperature, with very little breeze out of an unremembered direction.  the sky over the whole visible region was sparsely cloudy at high altitude, and the sun was at a position of approx. 45-50 degrees off of the horizon to the south.  the skies over the region were noticed to be filled with many high altitude aircraft con-trails, as well as a few aircraft in the active process of adding new trails.  while in the process of observing how lightly any high altitude winds were having dispersal effects on the various vapor trails, my attention was caught by one particular trail that was unusual, compared to the rest.  the unusual trail was located far to the south, and was estimated as being approx. over the metro-area of denver, with an east-to-west placement that was estimated over the general course of i-70.  the contrail was unusual, as besides the standard, normal-looking aircraft vapor trail, evenly spaced along its entire visible length the con-trail was "surrounded" by large, ring/donut-shaped "puffs".  the trail ran from as far as the eye could see to the east, and was lost to view eventually to the west, from blocking mountain terrain, with the aircraft responsible for the trail already gone from the area, before notice of the con-trail.  wind dispersal was light enough, that had the trail under observation for approx. 45 minutes, until resumption of work activities.  sketch available.
content.summary: "donuts-on-a-rope" con-trail sighting

content.detailedDescription: I was going out to the garage to sort out my laundry when i seen one very bright sphere in the sky just above the local milking parlour, so i stood and looked for a while, then maybe a minute later another one appeared to the right of it, at that a ran and got my 19 yr old daughter and partner, when they come a 3rd one appeared again to the right of the first 2, so i got my phone to take pictures and a video, as quickly as it came the 3rd disappeared, i took a video but it didn't puck them up, unfortunately i flippin deleted it but i took a photo, then about 5 minutes later the second dissapeared then the first, just like turning a light off in the house. if it was clouds covering them the first one on the left would have went out first, but it was a clear evening with no clouds that i could see. i was disappointed when i reviewed  the picture i thought the camera didn't pick them up but as i zoomed in the 2 white spheres appeared.  i am watching nasa's unexplained files and seen a few guests had mufcon after their name, so looked it up and seen report a sighting so that's what i'm doing lol could be nothing but thought i'd let the experts have a look.  the first picture is the original the second is a saved zoomed in copy.
content.summary: Saw a spherical light in the sky then another appeared then another, 3rd one disappeared then all disappeared

content.detailedDescription: at the time of the sighting, was working at a newly acquired job at a sand/gravel production pit that was located approx. 1/4 mile to the west of the intersection area of i-25 and co st. hwy. 119, just to the north of hwy. 119, near the little community of del camino, co.  had been working the job for a couple of weeks, which would put the sighting date around the middle of that month.  was in the site's "wash plant" area, where smaller particulate materials are processed (sand/small gravel), and was engaged in the activity of greasing conveyor belt return-roller zirks.  was in the process of attempting to attach the grease gun's fitting to the zirk of a conveyor return-roller that was situated a little above my head level, causing me to look almost directly upwards at the moment, while facing east.  while looking upwards, i noticed movement of an object passing through the air at moderately high altitude, as it entered my field of vision being used for the overhead work activity.  because of the object's color pattern, had initially thought it was some kind of gull/pelican/stork avian passing over the area, of a type more along a greyish coloration, than the more common white.  the displayed speed of the object rapidly ruled out an avian, so i stopped my activities and brought the object under intense observation.  atmospheric and weather conditions at the time were hot & balmy (close proximity of water sources, raised humidity levels), with mild breeze out of the sw, cloudless sky with light, high-altitude atmospheric haze, and the sun was at an approx. 45-50 degrees off of the horizon to the sse.  the object appeared as a large, basically triangular material construct that was longer in its fore-to-aft area, than in its side-to-side "wings" area.  the object appeared to be approx. 60-80 ft. in length x 40-60 ft. in width, and deviated from true triangular shape with a centralized, slight, angular extension to its shape in the aft area, giving it the appearance of actually possessing 4 angles and sides.  the object was of an overall light coloration, which allowed it to blend in quite well with the surrounding sky coloring prevalent at the time (normal light-blue, with slight greyish ting from haze).  a dark-colored "stripe" was noticed upon each of its "wings", running the length of the wing from fore-to-aft, and seemingly positioned onto the wing more heavily towards the wingtips, than the object's centerline.  object's altitude appeared to be noticeably below normal high-altitude cruising levels used by commercial airliners, and was estimated at approx. 20,000 ft., which the object did not appear to deviate from.  object was travelling on a south-to-north linear trajectory, seemingly as if above and following the course of i-25, which was maintained throughout the observation period.  the object displayed a consistent, rapid speed throughout the sighting, that i estimated to be approx. 3x the pace of a cruising high-altitude commercial airliner, or in excess of full-throttle speeds of most fighter jets.  as i watched the object pass overhead, i noticed that its passage was through a light layer of atmospheric haze, and that it was leaving a "wake-wash" turbulence effect in the haze behind its progress, although the object did not produce any kind of con-trail at that altitude.  safety ear-plugs were being worn at the time, and ambient noise levels of the area prevented any detection of associated sound.  object was observed for approx. 1.25 minutes on the northward trajectory, until lost to eyesight in the distance.  sketch available.
content.summary: Possible "aurora" spy-plane sighting

content.detailedDescription: My friend dallas took this video. he thought he had seen a ufo earlier in the day a couple times so he kept watching the sky throughout the rest of the day.  he just happened to be sitting at a red light and happened to catch something odd moving across the sky once again and thought he would film it this time. the video it self is a bit all over as he was waiting on a traffic light to turn green to keep driving and the excitement of seeing it again, the time he fades off the object and comes back after checking if street light turned green it was gone in thin air. he had planned on pulling in the parking lot to film but it was gone just like that!
content.summary: Sitting at stop light seen it in sky started filming object disappeared when looked back after glancing at stop lighttosee returned green and it was gone. pulled over seen nothing anywhere and sky's were clear he said.

content.detailedDescription: A triangular set of three lights were observed for approximately 30 seconds to 1 minute before vanishing. they were captured on video. they appeared to remain motionless.
content.summary: Submitting on behalf of a friend who would like to remain anonymous

content.detailedDescription: I was driving nw on hwy 8 out of arkadelphia when i saw a bright, reflective ufo to the sw down stream of the ouachita river. possibly above the soybean fields. it hovered for approx 30 seconds and then a flash of light and it dissiapeared
content.summary: Bright reflective ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday, january 20 2018, roughly 5:20ish pm est.
1.) outside with another adult and 2 children sledding in the backyard.

2.) the object was spotted accidently as i had pointed out to my brother in law that the stars were starting to come out. i had actually jokingly said that i come out at night and star gaze hoping to see a star that would just suddenly move. he then said....Like that? i assumed he was joking and was stunned when seeing the lights.

3.) at first we assumed it was a normal aircraft. he spotted it first and said what is that? then it disappeared. it then reappeared and that's when i spotted it.

4.) the craft moved in a straight line across the sky. had what i believe was 3 lights. they were solid white. it seemed to be similar to a tear drop or triangle kind of shape. couldn't make out much other than the 3 lights. we watched it move across the sky, maybe 4-5 seconds and then it was gone. it didn't flash away, it didn't slowly pull away, it was just gone. growing up close to an international airport and currently living near a small airport i am pretty familiar with seeing aircraft. i have never spotted an aircraft that made no noise or did not have flashing lights. 

the no noise struck me more than the solid lights. this was a lot closer than commercial airliners or the prop planes from the local airport ever are and i can always hear them.

5.) i looked at my bro in law and just said....."wtf was that?"
he just kept repeating...'where the hell did it go?'

6.) the craft just disappeared...
content.summary: Tear drop / triangle shape. 3 solid white lights. no flashing, no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was outside  working  and look up and saw this beautiful spot in the sky.  multicolored  did not move. stationary.   it wasnt raining.  it was cloudy and cold. it first appeared like a rainbow but there was no ark no rain no other light connecting to it.  my friend says he say a tail on it. lile a comet.  all i saw was a spot of beautiful  colors. i dont know what it is.
content.summary: Bright multicolored light. stationary.   i thought it was a rainbow. however there was no ark . no rain. only clouds. not moving

content.detailedDescription: Was headed to work when this light in the sky shined bright.  i noticed these objects once i reviewed my video footage.  did not notice any objects in the sky with the naked eye.  making moves that are unreal as if was defying gravity.  it’s just unbelievable that i caught this on video.  only videotaped it for 39 sec. i had to leave for work.
content.summary: Light on the left side of the video moving erratic.  on the tight side behind the rocket a moving ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
1... i was on my rear deck taking pics of this odd object during sunset.
2...Never saw anything like it in 60 years of outdoorsmanship.
3... military craft? i don't know. that's why i'm giving it over to you.
4... bewildered
6... sunset

so looking for your ideas on this??? i never saw anything like this. taken with my cannon digital 70-140 lens if that is of help..
thank you!
content.summary: Diamond shape on edge.

content.detailedDescription:
I was hiking up the side of a small mountain behind gull lake in the june lake loop area of the eastern calif. high sierra mts. i am former air force, and very familiar with flight dynamics and frequent military flights over nearby owens valley from edwards and other regional air bases.

i've never officially recorded this event that occurred in the fall of 1979, but decided it is about time to do so. 
in the late afternoon with the sun setting behind the mts. at my back, i was enjoying the view on a rock outcropping, looking east over gull and june lakes and to the owens valley beyond. i caught movement in the clear sky to the left of my vision (north) and suddenly observed what i assumed were two military jets in formation flying from north to south just past the lakes and at the western side of the north/south valley.
the objects i say were apparently above 500 feet over ground and estimate their speed between 300-400 mph. as i watched them, became immediately aware they had no observable flight surfaces (no wings or rear empennage).
they transited from my left 9 o'clock position to roughly my 2 o'clock, disappearing behind a mt. ridge after an approximate 20-40 seconds of view.
it was an extremely quiet late afternoon. i detected no sounds whatsoever from the objects. any and all aircraft i'd seen is similiar flight paths over the valley were easily heard, jet noise echoing off the mts. surrounding june lake. very puzzling sighting. the two objects exhibited no existing aircraft designs of which i was aware.
content.summary: Two apparent discs in formation.  est. 3-400 mph. no discernable flight surfaces, no sounds at all. objects over owens valley, ca.. no nav. lights observed.

content.detailedDescription: Clear day, only very high cirrus clouds off in the distance. 2:55 pm observed a grouping of approx 10-12 orbs circulating amongst themselves, similar to seeing a group of moths flying around a light bulb but only at as slower rate.  very high in the air, seemed way too high for birds. flight pattern not very "bird like". very white appearance, thought i seen a metallic reflection off one orb.  noticed the orbs were slowly fading.  reached for phone to record, objects were gone before i could record. also notice contrails of jet/plane much further up and a distance away.
content.summary: Cluster of white orbs spinning amongst them selves - slow fade out.

content.detailedDescription: Very loud humming pulsating noise woke me up never heard a nouse like it in my life then ther was a what sounded like to me a military jet i served ten years in the military as the sound disappeared past my house the jet seemed to followed they then both fadded away i have never heard any thing like it
content.summary: Very loud humming pulsating then follwed bye a fast jet

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the sky in my usual chill out spot when i spotted what i thought was a meteor.  it was a bright white light that increased in intensity as it appeared to enter the atmosphere, as you would expect a meteor to.  however, it slowed down and came to a stop, and as it was slowing down the light faded.

after a second or two at most, the light reappeared in the same location, but made a white streak across the sky (aprox 5degs) at 90 degrees to the direction it entered.

it was as though a ufo expected to land behind cloud cover, but missed and had to re-adjust its location.  call me insane, but i know what i saw, and i cannot explain it any other way.

i have never seen a ufo before, i'm 29 years old, and it made me have a breakdown about an hour later when it started sinking in what had happened.  elated at first, disillusioned and terrified later on...
content.summary: Light appeared similar to meteor, except it stopped, waited, and moved at 90 degs again!

content.detailedDescription: The night after second meteor had phone shooting video out of moonroof of my car. had it running for 5 mins and shut it off. set it up again and 20 seconds later i saw the flash, like a meteor, but travelling up. was more than 45 degree angle and moving really fast. disappeared into a clear sky. video speaks for itself, would like this to be seen by someone who can analyze it???
content.summary: Video of ufo up from lake michigan

content.detailedDescription: On the night of sept. 4, 1989, my boyfriend and i were camping on telos lake (part of the allagash waterway), a few miles south of the chamberlain bridge. we were the only people camping that week in the area according to the park ranger who left us all alone. we set up camp at the high bank campsite. at 11:30pm, we made a fire and were looking up at the sky. it was the clearest night sky i've ever seen. we saw a light moving a couple of miles up, but we knew there were no airports anywhere around. looking through binoculars, we noticed it moving in a straight line from right to left, looking like it was moving at the speed an airplane would move. all of sudden, the object came to a stop and then darted to the right to a stationary spot in the sky. we freaked out but still followed it with binoculars. lastly, the object either turned dark or it sped off away from the earth because it completely disappeared. there was nothing else moving in the sky at this point. we panicked and quickly put out our fire in a hurry. we ran into our tent, zipped it up and huddled in the corner. i've never felt so afraid in my life.
content.summary: Saw strange light in the sky a few miles up move in an abnormal fashion.

content.detailedDescription: I was returning from my daughter's house to my apt. i parked and noticed an odd rectangular shape in the clear night sky way up, but not directly overhead. there were no stars out and no air traffic. i couldn't see blinking lights on it like on planes or helicopters. and it wasn't moving close or leaving. i stood watching it about 2 mins trying to figure out what it was. i stopped looking to go to my apt and let my hubby know i was home. about five minutes later i got curious to see if it was still there and went outside. it was there, still rectangular. i went to get my phone and took a picture, which was not as clear as what i could actually see. then there was a sort of mist coming off it and a cylinder shape grew behind it. i photographed that too. i was like, "what the heck!" i stood there watching a few more minutes and then got unnerved being outside in the dark and alone, so i went back in the apt and didn't go back out at all. i also have a picture of it that includes my apt complex and the empty, dark night sky, but i couldn't access it from my photo gallery. i was able to include these two shots because they were enlarged previously in photoshop and easy to access.
content.summary: Saw rectangle in sky then a cylinder appeared with it; seemed misty around it. i was unnerved and went to my apt.

content.detailedDescription: At 12:25am est on 1/21/2018 while taking my dogs out i witnessed a bright red-orange orb hovering but moving slowly north-north west towards the city of winter garden.  i ran inside to get my smartphone and tried to get it on video - but i couldn't do it fast enough.  my wife also saw it as i rushed outside with my phone.  the event lasted about 30 seconds - the light started dimming slowly as the orb moved away and a few seconds later it just disappeared completely.  this is not the first or only time these red-orange orbs are observed in this area.
content.summary: Glowing orange sphere hovering over windermere florida
